author: Allum Bokhari, Allum Bokhari
title: Apple and Google Join Forces on Chinese Virus Phone Tracking
description: Apple and Google, who together control over 99 percent of the global smartphone operating system market, are joining forces to track contact between carriers of the Chinese virus and other individuals, using smartphone location data.
content:
Apple and Google, who together control over 99 percent of the global smartphone operating system market, are joining forces to track contact between carriers of the Chinese virus and other individuals, using smartphone location data.
